name: ByteFifoBuffer_getBufferedTest
description: Unit tests for the getBuffered method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testGetBufferedInitialState
test_cases.description: Tests the initial state of the getBuffered method, expecting 0 bytes buffered.

test_cases.name: testGetBufferedAfterWrite
test_cases.description: Tests the getBuffered method after writing data, expecting 256 bytes buffered.

test_cases.name: testGetBufferedAfterRead
test_cases.description: Tests the getBuffered method after writing and reading data, expecting 0 bytes buffered.

test_cases.name: testGetBufferedAfterPartialRead
test_cases.description: Tests the getBuffered method after writing and partially reading data, expecting 128 bytes buffered.

test_cases.name: testGetBufferedAfterMultipleWritesAndReads
test_cases.description: Tests the getBuffered method after multiple writes and reads, expecting 0 bytes buffered.
